body.p: Paragraphs BC27–BC37 discuss the presentation of insurance revenue and paragraphs BC38–BC49 discuss the presentation of insurance finance income and expenses. The Board considered and rejected:

li.p: other approaches to the presentation of insurance revenue, including:
other approaches to the presentation of insurance finance income and expenses:
include all insurance finance income or expenses in profit or loss; and
use the current period book yield for all contracts.
